trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" /> for an endpoint through configuration.

The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> is a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> subtype that can be used to include the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> on an endpoint through configuration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement> 為 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.BehaviorExtensionElement> 子型別，可透過組態用來包含端點上的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>。

trans-unit.source: There are no configurable properties on this element.
trans-unit.target: 此項目上沒有可設定的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>, in turn, allows an endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web pages when it is configured with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior> 接著會允許 ASP.NET AJAX 網頁在已使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.WebHttpBinding> 設定之後存取端點。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to enable a WCF service to respond to ASP.NET AJAX clients, see [Creating WCF Services for ASP.NET AJAX](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需如何啟用 WCF 服務回應 ASP.NET AJAX 用戶端的詳細資訊，請參閱[建立 ASP.NET AJAX 的 WCF 服務](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/creating-wcf-services-for-aspnet-ajax.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following is an example of using this configuration element to configure a WCF endpoint to be accessed by ASP.NET AJAX Web page.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用這個組態項目來設定 WCF 端點會由 ASP.NET AJAX 網頁存取的範例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebScriptEnablingElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>.
Gets the type of the behavior enabled by this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 取得此組態項目啟用的行為類型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Type" /> for the behavior enabled with the configuration element: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" />.
trans-unit.target: 此組態項目啟用之行為的 <see cref="T:System.Type" />：<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior" />。

trans-unit.source: The following sample returns the type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WebScriptEnablingBehavior>.
